Institution Name: SPORTS UNIVERSITY, IDUMUJE UGBOKO, DELTA STATE
UTME Requirements: Five credit passes at not more than two sittings in the Senior School Certificate Examination (SSCE) or its equivalent-- West African Senior School Certificate Examination (WASSCE), National Examination Council (NECO), National Technical Certificate (NTC) or General Certificate of Education (GCE O/L) in relevant subjects. The relevant subjects are English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects from the following: Chemistry, Physics, Further Mathematics, Statistics, Agricultural Science,  Biology, History and Geography.
Subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other subject.
